mapper.select: SELECT comment_id AS commentId, board_id AS boardId, user_id AS userId, comment_content AS commentContent, comment_created_at AS commentCreatedAt FROM tbl_comments WHERE board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY comment_created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comments (board_id, user_id, comment_content, comment_created_at) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{commentContent}, #{commentCreatedAt})
